content: horai scarf by roko use any yarn you like to take advantage of the pattern knit loosely using a somewhat larger needle size this will emphasize its delicate and lacy effect shown here yarn 2ply lace weight mohair gray-purple gradation 100g 900m / 985 yard 2 strands held together - alternative recommended yarn- kidsilk haze by rowan seika by hasegawa corporation of japan excellent mohair count 10 gradation by richmore needle 7 0 mm gauge 22 sts / 4 in pattern stitch finished size 35 cm / 14 wide 226 cm / 90 long page 1 special instruction horai stitch hs k3tog yo k3tog into one stitch see following photos video tutorial of horai stitch by alissou and camillefred thank you so much http //www youtube com/watch v=uioxo1xr9ho pattern cast on 79 stitches or multiple of 4 plus 3 stitches k 2 row row 1 hs k1 to last 3 stitches hs row 2 k to end row 3 k2 hs k1 to last 1 stitch k1 row 4 k to end repeat these 4 row to your desired length k 1 row bind off all stitches enjoy horai scarf pattern 2011©roko all right reserved personal use only http //rokoknit blog93 fc2 com/ page 2
